p:
Unlike the seasonal circulation of RSV that is generally observed in temperate
16– 18 and tropical climates
19– 21 , RSV-A circulated almost throughout the year, similar to observations made in Senegal in 2012 and 2013 but not 2014
22 . PIVs, and IVs in particular, circulated for shorter periods of time. The predominance of one particular RSV type in one season, namely RSV-A in 2015, was similar to that observed in Mali (RSV-B in 2013)
23 , Senegal (RSV-B in 2012, RSV-A in 2013, RSV-B in 2014)
22 , Ghana (RSV-B in 2006 and 2013, RSV-A in 2014)
21 , and the United States (RSV- in 2015)
16 .
